detaileddescription.para: constructor the optional parameter is a path to a WSDL file that you'd like to bind the server instance to.

parameterdescription.para: file path or URL (string), or wsdl instance (object) public

detaileddescription.para: processes request and returns response

parameterdescription.para: usually is the value of $HTTP_RAW_POST_DATA public

detaileddescription.para: parses HTTP request headers.
The following fields are set by this function (when successful)
headers request xml_encoding SOAPAction
private
parses a request
The following fields are set by this function (when successful)
headers request xml_encoding SOAPAction request requestSOAP methodURI methodname methodparams requestHeaders document
This sets the fault field on error
invokes a PHP function for the requested SOAP method
The following fields are set by this function (when successful)
methodreturn
Note that the PHP function that is called may also set the following fields to affect the response sent to the client
responseHeaders outgoing_headers
This sets the fault field on error
private
serializes the return value from a PHP function into a full SOAP Envelope
The following fields are set by this function (when successful)
responseSOAP
This sets the fault field on error
private
sends an HTTP response
The following fields are set by this function (when successful)
outgoing_headers response
private
takes the value that was created by parsing the request and compares to the method's signature, if available.

simplesect.para: boolean Whether the operation was found private

detaileddescription.para: processes SOAP message received from client

simplesect.para: mixed value of the message, decoded into a PHP type private

detaileddescription.para: gets the HTTP body for the current response.

simplesect.para: string The HTTP body, which includes the SOAP payload private

detaileddescription.para: gets the HTTP content type for the current response.
Note: getHTTPBody must be called before this.

simplesect.para: string the HTTP content type for the current response. private

detaileddescription.para: gets the HTTP content type charset for the current response. returns false for non-text content types.
Note: getHTTPBody must be called before this.

simplesect.para: string the HTTP content type charset for the current response. private

detaileddescription.para: add a method to the dispatch map (this has been replaced by the register method)
register a service function with the server

parameterdescription.para: the name of the PHP function, class.method or class..method
assoc array of input values: key = param name, value = param type
assoc array of output values: key = param name, value = param type
the element namespace for the method or false
the soapaction for the method or false
optional (rpc|document) or false Note: when 'document' is specified, parameter and return wrappers are created for you automatically
optional Description to include in WSDL

detaileddescription.para: Specify a fault to be returned to the client. This also acts as a flag to the server that a fault has occured.
Sets up wsdl object. Acts as a flag to enable internal WSDL generation

parameterdescription.para: optional URL of service endpoint or false
optional (rpc|document) WSDL style (also specified by operation)
optional 'types' targetNamespace for service schema or false

detaileddescription.para: soap_server allows the user to create a SOAP server that is capable of receiving messages and returning responses
NOTd: WSDL functionality is experimental

Dietrich Ayala dietrich@ganx4.com
